document.full_text: garyovo, russia  - russia will boost its efforts to explore the solar system and seek a bigger share of the market for space launches in the next decade, prime minister vladmir putin said on thursday.
document.title: russia targets bigger role for space program
lines_and_colors: garyovo, russia  - russia will boost its efforts to explore the solar system and seek a bigger share of the market for space launches in the next decade, prime minister vladmir putin said on thursday.
